sen.j: 種痘所（しゅとうしょ）とは、日本において天然痘の予防及び治療を目的に設立された医療機関。
sen.e: Shutosho (vaccination institute) is the name of the medical institute established for the purpose of prevention and treatment of smallpox in Japan.

sen.e: The "Otamagaike Shutosho" (today's University of Tokyo, Faculty of Medicine), opened in 1858 and is one of Japan's most famous institutes.

sen.e: The first Shutosho was opened in Nagasaki on July 20, 1849 by Otto Gottlieb Johann Mohnike.
